title: Updated 2br with Office! HW Flooring! Near Kendall and Lechmere!
posting_body: ['IMPORTANT -', 'Write your real email address into your inquiry.', 'Only inquiries that include this will be responded to.', 'Updated 2 bdrm w/ office for rent located on Jefferson St in Cambridge.', '-Remodeled unit!', '-Walk to Lechmere Train Station!', 'Available NOW!', 'Sep 1st', 'is the', 'latest', 'it can be held for.', '"This is a nicely updated 2 bedroom with office available by Kendall Square in Cambridge.', 'Updated unit with remodeled kitchen!', 'Beautiful hardwood flooring!', 'Walk to Lechmere or Kendall Square Station!', 'Contact ASAP for a showing!"', 'FEATURES:', '-Hardwood Flooring', '-Gas Stove', '-Pantry', '-Near Major Bus Routes', '-Walk to Lechmere Train Station', 'FLOOR:', '3rd', 'PROPERTY TYPE:', 'Three-Family', 'HEAT:', 'Electric', 'WASHER and DRYER OPTION:', 'In-Unit Hook-Up Negotiable', 'PARKING:', 'Street Parking', 'PET POLICY:', 'Cat Negotiable', '$2600 a Month.', 'To Rent:', 'First + Last + Half Fee.', 'Qualifications:', 'Good credit', 'and a minimum gross household income of', '$93K', '.', 'Notes:', 'No smoking.', 'Located in Somerville.', 'Somerville is situated right next to Cambridge and Boston.', 'Closest train station is located at Davis Station (Red Line) in Somerville or Porter Station (Red Line) in Cambridge.', 'There are also multiple MBTA bus lines with frequent service throughout Somerville.', "Somerville's surrounding communities are Cambridge, Boston, Medford, Arlington, and Everett.", 'MA - Mass - Massachusetts.', '"All that we do is done with an eye to something else."', '- Aristotle', 'IMPORTANT -', 'Write your real email address into your inquiry.', 'Only inquiries that include this will be responded to.']
